description: PAL/ Construction and Capacity Building for the Ministry of Social Affairs - Home Care for the Elderly in Jericho

subproject.corporate outcome: Expansion and access to financial services for the poor, employment and income generation and access to markets, goods and services.
subproject.description: This project aims at providing technical and infrastructural support to the only governmental agency caring for the homeless and disabled elderly people, located in Jericho. Works will include the levelling and reconstruction of the old site, oroiinally built in 1995 in Jericho over a 23 dunum lpot of land, to service  the needs of al least 80 old people and 18 staff members. There will be an infrustructural component which will be complemented with the capacity building exercise for the Ministry of Social Affairs.
subproject.title: Const. & Capacity (Elderly)

title: PAL/ Const. and Capacity Building - Home Care (elderly)
